title: BulkOperationResult
description: Represents result of bulk Operation performed on entities.

rowCount.description: Type used to indicate row count

index.description: Type used to indicate row number or field number. In CSV the indexes start with 1.

response.description: Request that can be processed successfully.

request.description: Request that can be processed successfully.

dryRun.description: True if the operation has dryRun flag enabled

abortReason.description: Reason why import was aborted. This is set only when the `status` field is set to `aborted`

successRequest.description: Request that can be processed successfully.

failedRequest.description: Failure Request that can be processed successfully.
